markdownRemark.html:
TMux

descriptio://lukaszwrobel.pl/blog/tmux-tutorial-split-terminal-windows-easily/

C -> Control

C - b % -> split window horizontally C - b ” -> split window vertically C - b Switch to window C - d delete window

https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/learn-linux-vim-basic-features-19134461ab85/ :tabedit filename
